DataShape.description: Information about an active thread pool
DataShape.name: ThreadPoolStats

FieldDefinition.description: Number of threads actively processing tasks
FieldDefinition.name: activeThreads

FieldDefinition.description: Total number of tasks that completed execution
FieldDefinition.name: completedTaskCount

FieldDefinition.description: Core number of threads in the pool
FieldDefinition.name: corePoolSize

FieldDefinition.description: Number of threads currently in pool
FieldDefinition.name: curentPoolSize

FieldDefinition.description: Most number of threads ever present in pool
FieldDefinition.name: largestPoolSize

FieldDefinition.description: Total number of tasks submited to pool
FieldDefinition.name: submitedTaskCount
